book.synopsis: Spending their days at a sprawling Indiana antique mart surrounded by dusty furniture and cast-off clothing, Hazel, Claudia, and Rebekah find their circumstances revitalized by three romances and the unexpected arrival of two babies. By the author of A Girl Named Zippy. 40,000 first printing.
book.dimensions: Height: 9.5 Inches, Length: 6.25 Inches, Weight: 1.1 Pounds, Width: 1.25 Inches
